items.title: EMA Says Active Substance in Tardive Dyskinesia Drug Not New
items.description: New draft guidelines on the definition of new active substances don’t apply to deutetrabenazine, the European drug regulator has decided. Medscape Med...

items.title: Which Food Labeling System Promotes Healthier Purchases?

items.title: Europe Adopts New Subcutaneous Route for Systemic Lupus Drug
items.description: Saphnelo can now be administered subcutaneously rather than intravenously following the European regulator’s recommendation. Medscape Medical News

items.title: Optimal Anesthesia Choice in EVT: A Wake-Up Call?

items.title: EMA OKs First Therapy for Non-Cystic Fibrosis Bronchiectasis
items.description: Estimates suggest between 400,000 and three million people in Europe have NCFB. Medscape Medical News
